org.springframework.kafka.test.rule

类 KafkaEmbedded

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.junit.rules.ExternalResource
      • org.springframework.kafka.test.rule.KafkaEmbedded
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    org.junit.rules.TestRule, org.springframework.beans.factory.DisposableBean, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean, KafkaRule

    public class KafkaEmbedded
extends org.junit.rules.ExternalResource
implements KafkaRule, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean, org.springframework.beans.factory.DisposableBean
    The KafkaRule implementation for the embedded Kafka Broker and Zookeeper.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • KafkaEmbedded

        public KafkaEmbedded(int count)

      • KafkaEmbedded

        public KafkaEmbedded(int count,
                     boolean controlledShutdown,
                     java.lang.String... topics)
        Create embedded Kafka brokers.
        参数:
        count - the number of brokers.
        controlledShutdown - passed into TestUtils.createBrokerConfig.
        topics - the topics to create (2 partitions per).

      • KafkaEmbedded

        public KafkaEmbedded(int count,
                     boolean controlledShutdown,
                     int partitions,
                     java.lang.String... topics)
        Create embedded Kafka brokers.
        参数:
        count - the number of brokers.
        controlledShutdown - passed into TestUtils.createBrokerConfig.
        partitions - partitions per topic.
        topics - the topics to create.

    • 方法详细资料

      • brokerProperties

        public KafkaEmbedded brokerProperties(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> brokerProperties)
        Specify the properties to configure Kafka Broker before start, e.g. auto.create.topics.enable, transaction.state.log.replication.factor etc.
        参数:
        brokerProperties - the properties to use for configuring Kafka Broker(s).
        返回:
        this for chaining configuration
        另请参阅:
        KafkaConfig

      • setKafkaPorts

        public void setKafkaPorts(int... kafkaPorts)
        Set explicit ports on which the kafka brokers will listen. Useful when running an embedded broker that you want to access from other processes.
        参数:
        kafkaPorts - the ports.
        从以下版本开始:
        1.3
